remarks: Axiom of Replacement.  Axiom 7' of [Crosilla], p.  "Axioms of CZF and IZF" (with unnecessary quantifier removed).  In our context this is not an axiom, but a theorem proved from ~ ax-coll .  It is identical to ~ zfrep6 except for the choice of a freeness hypothesis rather than a distinct variable constraint between ` b ` and ` ph ` .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 23-Aug-2018.)
statement:
ax-coll.1 $e |- F/ b ph $.
repizf $p |- ( A. x e. a E! y ph -> E. b A. x e. a E. y e. b ph ) $.
$d a b x y $.
